notes: base lemma
example_sentence_english: I want to find the keys.

notes: used with auxiliary 'avere' to form compound tenses

example_sentence_italian: Io trovo sempre ciò che cerco.
example_sentence_english: I always find what I look for.

notes: also 'you (formal)'

notes: also 'you were (formal)'
example_sentence_english: He found it difficult to concentrate.

example_sentence_italian: Noi trovavamo piacere in piccoli gesti.
example_sentence_english: We found pleasure in small gestures.
